mapper.select: SELECT DB_Answer.Id AS id, DB_Answer.Name AS name, DB_Answer.Comments AS comments, DB_Answer.Date_Create AS dateCreate, DB_Answer.IdOffer, DB_Answer.IdNeeds, CONCAT(DB_OFFERS.name, DB_Needs.name) AS nameOfferORNeed FROM DB_Answer LEFT JOIN DB_OFFERS ON DB_Answer.IdOffer = DB_OFFERS.offerId LEFT JOIN DB_Needs ON DB_Answer.IdNeeds = DB_Needs.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_Answer (Name, Comments, IdOffer, IdNeeds) VALUES (#{name}, #{comments}, #{idOffer}, #{idNeeds});
INSERT INTO DB_Answer (Name, Comments, IdOffer, IdNeeds) VALUES (#{name}, #{comments}, #{idOffer}, NULL);
